response:
"wovon wir nicht sprechen, können uns nicht verfolgen. aber wovon wir sprechen, kann uns auch nicht schützen. #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "what we don't talk about can't be tracked. but what we do talk about can't protect us either. #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the idea that by not discussing personal information, we can protect our privacy. however, it also acknowledges that even when we do talk about personal matters, it doesn't necessarily mean that our privacy is secure. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to categorize the post and make it discoverable by others interested in these topics.
